meaningMnemonic: The <radical>ear</radical> and the <radical>mouth</radical> of a <radical>king</radical> are <kanji>holy</kanji>. The king has holy hearing and holy eating abilities. This king is divine.
readingMnemonic: This <kanji>holy</kanji> king has heard of you and your special <reading>sa</reading>ber (せい) that glows with pure, blue light. Specifically, the holy king wants to use it on his food!
